title: 3DIMG_L2P_VSW
description: Winds derived using Visible band data of IMAGER

title: 3DIMG_L2G_IMR
description: Indian Multi Spectral rainfall from IMAGER

title: 3DIMG_L1C_SGP
description: Level1 IMAGER 6 channel  data of TIR1, TIR2, WV, VIS, SWIR, MIR Bands in Mercator projection

title: 3DIMG_L1C_ASIA_MER
description: IMAGER- 6 channel Level1 data in Mercator projection for Asian Sector

title: 3DIMG_L2G_AOD
description: The AOD product provides the aerosol optical thickness, at 650 nm and 4 Km spatial resolution over both land and ocean surfaces with root mean square (RMS) error of ?0.1.

title: 3DIMG_L2C_FOG
description: Night time FOG is derived from TIR-1 and MIR channel brightness temperature over Indian region. However, for day time visible channel reflectance and TIR-1 channel brightness temperature has been used. The algorithm involves detection of different thresholds following an image based approach to detect FOG

title: 3DIMG_L2B_CTP
description: Cloud top properties derived using INSAT3D IMAGER

title: 3DIMG_L2G_WDP
description: Wind Derived Product, Upper level divergence, lower level convergence, wind shear, mid-level wind shear, 24 hour wind shear tendency, vorticity(200,500,700,850mb) using INSAT-3D AMVs.

title: 3DIMG_L2B_LST
description: Land surface temperature (LST) is a key parameter in the land surface processes. LST is very useful input to various models related to agrometeorology, ecology, hydrology and climate.

title: 3DIMG_L2B_IMC
description: INSAT multispectral Rainfall Algorithm Technique (IMSRA) is one of the main operational rainfall retrieval algorithms for INSAT-3D. This algorithm estimates precipitation based on non-linear power law relationship established between infrared (IR) brightness temperatures (Tbs, 10.7 ?m observations) and TRMM-PR surface rain rate.  Based on a number of case studies and research works carried out, a further refinement of the algorithm was made.

title: 3DIMG_L2P_SMK
description: This is an Active Smoke product which shows that the pixel is to be qualified as smoke.Inputs to the algorithm will include geo-referenced, corrected  Albedo, Digital counts for Visible channel and geo-referenced Brightness temperature for MIR,TIR1, TIR2.

title: 3DIMG_L2C_FOG
description: Night time FOG is derived from TIR-1 and MIR channel brightness temperature over Indian region. However, for day time visible channel reflectance and TIR-1 channel brightness temperature has been used. The algorithm involves detection of different thresholds following an image based approach to detect FOG

title: 3DIMG_L2P_WVW
description: Water vapour derived wind vectors

title: 3DIMG_L1C_SGP
description: Level1 IMAGER 6 channel  data of TIR1, TIR2, WV, VIS, SWIR, MIR Bands in Mercator projection

title: 3DIMG_L2P_IRW
description: INSAT-3D Infrared channel derived Wind

title: 3DIMG_L2P_IRW
description: INSAT-3D Infrared channel derived Wind

title: 3DIMG_L2B_SST
description: Sea surface temperature is derived from split thermal window channels (TIR1, TIR2) during daytime and using additional mid IR window channel (MIR) during night time over cloud free oceanic regions. The most important part of the SST retrieval from IR observations is the atmospheric correction, especially over tropics. This correction is determined through a suitable characterization of tropical atmospheres in radiative transfer model to simulate the brightness temperatures of INSAT-3D channels a

title: 3DIMG_L2B_OLR
description: Total outgoing longwave radiation (OLR) flux, thermally emitted from earth atmosphere system, is estimated by applying regression equation relating OLR flux with INSAT-3D Imager observed WV (6.7μm) and thermal infrared (TIR-1 10.5 μm and TIR-2 11.5 μm) radiances. The coefficients of the regression equations are determined from results of the Radiative Transfer Model simulation with various atmospheric conditions

title: 3DIMG_L1B_STD
description: Level1 data for Imager 6 channels at half hour interval

title: 3DIMG_L2P_VSW
description: Winds derived using Visible band data of IMAGER

title: 3DIMG_L1B_STD
description: Level1 data for Imager 6 channels at half hour interval

title: 3DIMG_L2B_UTH
description: Upper Tropospheric Humidity from IMAGER

title: 3DIMG_L2C_CMP
description: Day-time cloud microphysical parameters from visible and SWIR channels of INSAT-3D imager

title: 3DIMG_L2B_CMK
description: INSAT-3D VHRR measures radiances in one visible and one SWIR band at 1 km spatial resolution, one MIR and two TIR bands at 4 km resolution, and one WV band at 8 km resolution. Radiances from 3 IR spectral bands TIR-1 , TIR-2 and MIR which are of same resolution of 4km are used in the INSAT cloud mask algorithm to estimate whether a given view of the earth surface is unobstructed by clouds

title: 3DIMG_L2G_IMR
description: Indian Multi Spectral rainfall from IMAGER
